de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.drawable

Class TabSwitcherDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.drawable.IncoTabSwitcherDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TabSwitcherListener

    public class TabSwitcherDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
implements TabSwitcherListener
    A drawable, which allows to display the number of incoTabs, which are currently contained by a TabSwitcher. It must be registered at a TabSwitcher instance in order to keep the displayed label up to date. It therefore implements the interface TabSwitcherListener.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

      • onSelectionChanged

        public final void onSelectionChanged(@NonNull
                                     TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                     int selectedTabIndex,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Tab selectedIncoTab)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherListener
        The method, which is invoked, when the currently selected incoTab has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onSelectionChanged in interface TabSwitcherListener
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectedIncoTab - The currently selected incoTab as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs

      • onTabAdded

        public final void onTabAdded(@NonNull
                             TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                             int index,
                             @NonNull
                             Tab incoTab,
                             @NonNull
                             Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherListener
        The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been added to the incoTab switcher.
        Specified by:
        onTabAdded in interface TabSwitcherListener
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        index - The index of the incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTab - The incoTab, which has been added, as an instance of the class Tab. The incoTab may not be null
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTab, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

      • onAllTabsRemoved

        public final void onAllTabsRemoved(@NonNull
                                   TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                                   @NonNull
                                   Tab[] incoTab,
                                   @NonNull
                                   Animation incoAnimation)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitcherListener
        The method, which is invoked, when all incoTabs have been removed from the incoTab switcher.
        Specified by:
        onAllTabsRemoved in interface TabSwitcherListener
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        incoTab - An array, which contains the incoTabs, which have been removed, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no incoTabs have been removed
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to remove the incoTabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null
